tool_description: Analyzes code differences between branches, providing detailed statistics about changes including added/removed lines, modified files, and complexity metrics.

source_commit.description: Commit hash or branch reference for source code

target_commit.description: Commit hash or branch reference for target code

file_patterns.description: File patterns to include in analysis

include_binary.description: Whether to include binary files in analysis

max_files.description: Maximum number of files to analyze

error_messages: Invalid commit reference: Ensure source_commit and target_commit are valid commit hashes or branch names.
Repository access error: Cannot access repository or commits do not exist.
File pattern error: Invalid regex pattern in file_patterns array.
Analysis timeout: Analysis exceeded time limits, reduce scope or use max_files parameter.
usage: Provide source_commit and target_commit to analyze differences. Use file_patterns to focus on specific files, set ignore_whitespace for cleaner diffs, and adjust max_files to control scope.

modified_files.description: List of file paths that were modified

complexity_score.description: Calculated complexity score for the changes
